attributes.action: RELEASE MRS FABIANNA CONNOR FROM INCARCERATION  IN YARLSWOOD AND DEPORTATION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i am a british citizen geoffrey peter connor ihave been married to my wife 5 and half years, my wife escaped from sierra leone 2001 and has lived and worked in the uk since arriving here as an asylum seeker 

my wife mrs fabianne connor is presently being held in Yarlswood camp
with a view to her deportation to sierra leone.  please release her

rejection.details: Unfortunately we cannot accept petitions of this nature, as individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office. Please refer to our terms and conditions for more information: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
